solution_line_template: If Kameron has {kameron_kangaroos} kangaroos, he has {kameron_kangaroos}-{bert_kangaroos}= <<{kameron_kangaroos}-{bert_kangaroos}={difference_kangaroos}>>{difference_kangaroos} more kangaroos than Bert.
Buying {daily_purchase_rate} kangaroos every day, it will take Bert {difference_kangaroos}/{daily_purchase_rate}={days_to_match} days to have the same number of kangaroos as Kameron has now.
